price: Olúwa rẹ nímọ̀ jùlọ nípa àwọn tó ń bẹ nínú àwọn sánmọ̀ àti ilẹ̀. Dájúdájú A ti ṣe oore àjùlọ fún apá kan àwọn Ànábì lórí apá kan. A sì fún (Ànábì) Dāwūd ní Zabūr.
arabic: وَرَبُّكَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَلَقَدۡ فَضَّلۡنَا بَعۡضَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَا دَاوُۥدَ زَبُورٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: warabbuka aʿlamu biman fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi walaqad faḍḍalnā baʿḍa al-nabiyīna ʿalā baʿḍin waātaynā dāwūda zabūran
